unnormalised: As Onam approaches and demand for everything from silk sarees to biryani ingredients surges, manufacturers across India are doubling down on quality control. Experts at the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Madras, are advocating for stricter adherence to Six Sigma principles to minimize defects.

unnormalised: "Even a minor flaw can lead to significant losses during peak season," explains Dr. Meena Iyer, Head of Operations at IIT Madras.
